highlights: Assisting the Firmware Team by writing low level software codes and unit tests.
Implementing bigger features and writing documentation.

work.company: Budapest University of Technology and Economics
highlights: Teaching intro level programming and digital technology classes for first year students, by explaining and presenting solutions to tasks.
Assisting the instructor in computer labs by helping the students individually.
Communicating with students mostly via email and advising them about school policy.
Representing student interests at various meetings.
work.company: Budapest University of Technology and Economics

projects.name: BSc Thesis
projects.description: A secondary bootloader for Infineon Aurix microcontroller. Implementing Software Over The Air by receiving the new image via TFTP, loading it into memory and activating it.

projects.name: Sensor Network with BeagleBone and ESP32
projects.description: A sensor network capable of monitoring temperature lightning and other similar qualities. Using a BeagleBone and an ESP32 connected together as the head of the network, and ESP8266-s with sensors as the nodes.
